Teleport Device:
Conquest Area Information
How to get there:
You need a character with level 110+ and be sure you check the entry time: every Friday, Saturday and Sunday from 8 p.m. until 1 a.m.
Hunting zones:
- besides exp and sp monsters here also give Bloody Coins used to buy few things from npc Chloe in Aden or Rune. - there is a chance that when hunting in these areas some rare monsters show up and they drop large amount of coins based on their level.
Daril's Water Source and Daril Phran's Water Source (Monsters Lv. 112 and 116): - are right next to the Conquest City. - you can get there without teleport. - monsters here drop 1 Bloody Coins.
Asa - Region 1 (Monsters Lv. 116) Anima - Region 1 (Monsters Lv. 116) Nox - Region 1 (Monsters Lv. 116) - are a bit further than first zones. - you can get there with or without teleport. - monsters here drop 2 Bloody Coins.
Asa - Region 2 (Monsters Lv. 120) Anima - Region 2 (Monsters Lv. 120) Nox - Region 2 (Monsters Lv. 120) - are a bit further than first zones. - you can get there with or without teleport. - monsters here drop 3 Bloody Coins.
Asa - Region 3 (Monsters Lv. 124) Anima - Region 1 (Monsters Lv. 124) Nox - Region 3 (Monsters Lv. 124) Callide Hall (Monsters Lv. 124) - are a bit further than first zones. - you can get there with or without teleport. - monsters here drop 4 Bloody Coins.
